snippet: How can fish and seafood be scarce if they're there in the market when you want them? But in every ocean, rapacious trawlers, purse seiners and longliners are overfishing to an alarming degree.
abstract: How can fish and seafood be scarce if they're there in the market when you want them? But in every ocean, rapacious trawlers, purse seiners and longliners are overfishing to an alarming degree.

headline.main: There's Just One Catch to the Idea of Inexhaustible Seafood -- It's Wrong
